selectLetters.title: Kōwhiri Reta:
selectLetters.description: Pāwhiria ngā pātene huri noa i te huringa hei waihanga i tētahi kupu. Kei roto i te huringa:
selectLetters.vowels: Ngā oropuare Māori: a, e, i, o, u
selectLetters.longVowels: Ngā oropuare roa me te tohutō: ā, ē, ī, ō, ū
selectLetters.note: Ka kitea ngā reta he maha hoki, engari, kotahi anake te whakaaturanga i te huringa.

formingWords.title: Te Waihanga Kupu:
formingWords.correctSpelling: Me tika te takitaki o ngā kupu i roto i te reo Māori, me whakamahi hoki i te tohutō me i nga wā tika.
formingWords.availableLetters: Me riro katoa ngā reta o te kupu mai i ngā reta e whitu kei roto i te huringa.
formingWords.minLength: Kia X te roa iti o ngā reta (whakamaramatia tēnei roa iti mēnā koia te herenga).

submitAuto.title: Tuku Aunoa:
submitAuto.autoAppear: Ka oti ana tētahi kupu tika, ka kitea aunoatia i te pangakupu i runga i te huringa.

editing.title: Whakatikatika:
editing.mistake: I hē koe? Pāwhiritia te pātene mukua i waenganui i te huringa hei tangohia tāu reta mutunga i kōwhiriti ai.
editing.keepTapping: Me pāwhiri tonu i te pātene "tuku" kia tangohia ngā reta tētahi i muri i tētahi.

continue.title: Haere Tonu:
continue.afterSuccess: Ki te kitea tētahi kupu tiki, haere tonu ki te kimi atu.
continue.findAll: Me ngana koe ki te kite i ngā kupu katoa kua huna ki te panga kupu!

tips.title: Tohutohu
tips.diacriticals: Kaua e wareware ki te whakamahi i te tohutō i ngā wā e tika ai—he reta rerekē ēnei.
tips.differences: He maha ngā kupu Māori i rerekē nā te whakamahia o te tohutō. Kia tūpato:
tips.example: Hei tauira, he kupu rerekē katoa ēnei: keke, kēkē, kekē.
tips.pronunciation: Whakarongo ki te whakahua o ngā kupu Māori—he tohu ēnei mō te tātaki kupu tika.

confirmRefresh.title: Tīmata Kēmu Hōu?
confirmRefresh.message: Mā tēnei koe ka whakatūngia tō whakaahu whakamua, ā, ka tīmata hōu ai he kēmu.

messages.letterNotAvailable: Kāore te reta nei i roto i tētahi kupu
messages.threeLetterHint: Me ngana ki te kimi i ngā reta mō ngā kupu roa atu!
messages.wordDetectionExplanation: If you type any word that is shorter than the maximum word length, wait three seconds and I will automatically determine if it is correct. Otherwise, click on the enter key to the right of where your word appears.

uploader.title: Tikiake Kōnae Kupu Motuhake
uploader.description: Tikiake he kōnae kupu Māori (kotahi kupu i ia raina) hei hanga panga kupu motuhake.
uploader.dragDrop: Tōia, whakangā hoki he kōnae .txt ki konei, pāwhiri rānei ki te pātene kōwhiri
uploader.error: I raruraru te uta kōnae. Me tikiake anō.
uploader.startGame: Tīmata i te kēmu ki ngā kupu motuhake

languageDropdown.acknowledgment: Ngā mihi ki a Mary Boyce nāna ka rārangi kupu e whakamahia i tēnei tanga kupu.

loading: E tukuatu ana ngā kupu Māori...
